snippet.title: Sniper Bot - Official Trailer | The MIX x Kinda Funny Spring Showcase 2024
snippet.description: Here's your look at Sniperbot: The Hype Game in this slick trailer for the upcoming retro-styled, rhythm-based action platformer game. Sniperbot: The Hype Game is coming to PC and consoles in 2025. In Sniperbot: The Hype Game, you will traverse through the cybertech world of Meta Metro, where Hypebeasts run wild, clout is currency and the only way to survive is attacking your enemies and fighting boss battles with a blaster and sword, all while keeping on beat to a late 80s / early 90s Hip Hop soundtrack!
